Class MediaPlayerController

java.lang.Object
musicApp.controllers.ViewController<MediaPlayerView,MediaPlayerController>
musicApp.controllers.MediaPlayerController
public class MediaPlayerController extends ViewController<MediaPlayerView,MediaPlayerController>
